ORCID.description: The Open Research Contributor Identifier (ORCID) is a persistent and unique digital ID for scientific and other academic authors and contributors.

email.description: Email address of a person or organization.

affiliation.description: An affiliation index, or a comma separated list of affiliation indices.

affiliations.description: List of institutions; each item listed here should relate to at least one author.

name.description: The full name of the affiliation; usually the name of an institute or company.

index.description: Integer specifying the relative number of this affiliation; see also authors.affiliation.

items.description: A single tag or key-word; may contain spaces.

date.description: The date on which the article was written or published. The date format can be chosen freely.
